system.effect: Torpedo Rating: (+20). At start of Torpedo's Movement, one Explorer or NPC can make +0 Tech-Use to change direction up to 45 degrees per DoS, and can slow Mveoment for round by 1 VU. If enemy has identified Torpedo Tubes, can make -40 Tech-Use Check to take control of Torpedo.
